text: Hau hakuhĩ nao nĩ haarĩ na ndigithũ ithathatũ cia maaĩ ciathondeketwo na ihiga, mũthemba ũrĩa wahũthagĩrwo nĩ Ayahudi magongona-inĩ mao ma gwĩtheria,2:6 Ayahudi meetĩkĩtie mũndũ nĩanyiitagwo nĩ thaahu o mũthenya, na nĩkĩo meethambaga moko hĩndĩ ciothe. na o ĩmwe yaiyũragio nĩ ngeereni kuuma mĩrongo ĩĩrĩ nginya mĩrongo ĩtatũ.
